name: Grilled Chicken Kabob
description: Juicy marinated chicken skewers grilled to perfection, served with our signature garlic sauce.

name: Beef Kofta Kabob
description: Savory ground beef mixed with spices, grilled on skewers, and served with a side of tangy tzatziki.

name: Vegetarian Falafel Wrap
description: Crispy falafel balls wrapped in warm pita, topped with fresh veggies and our homemade tahini sauce.
